sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Volunteer Emergency Worker Higher Education Protection Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Volunteer Emergency Worker Higher Education Protection Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. For the purposes of this Section:
sections.text: Definitions. For the purposes of this Section:

sections.heading: Accommodation policy. Each public institution of higher education must adopt a policy that reasonably accommodates any student who is a volunteer emergency worker in regard to absence from class caused by the performance of his or her duties as a volunteer emergency worker

Publication of policy. Each institution of higher education must publish the policy adopted under Section 10 of this Act in a handbook, manual, or other similar document regularly provided to faculty and students
sections.text: Publication of policy. Each institution of higher education must publish the policy adopted under Section 10 of this Act in a handbook, manual, or other similar document regularly provided to faculty and students.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect on July 1, 2006.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect on July 1, 2006.
